column4: i'm using my all of my download bandwidth, and accessing my server is going much slower than usual why is this i have 3mbit upload that's hardly being used
everytime i have that problem its always an ISP issue.  I would start there to rule that out.
hmm what kind of issue then? my upload is fine normally i don't have upload problems, this is the first time
it might not be I just know in my experience i always find out at speedtest.net that my upload limit is really low and call the ISP and they say 'oh yeah somethings wrong'
